scenarios.name: Canvas Line Manip End completes successfully
scenarios.given: the system is initialized and ready for Canvas Line Manip End operations
scenarios.when: a valid Canvas Line Manip End request is processed
scenarios.then: the operation completes without errors and emits success events

scenarios.name: Canvas Line Manip End handles failures gracefully
scenarios.given: the Canvas Line Manip End operation is in progress
scenarios.when: an unexpected error occurs during execution
scenarios.then: the system logs the error, emits failure events, and maintains consistent state

scenarios.name: Canvas Line Manip End records telemetry metrics
scenarios.given: telemetry collection is enabled for Canvas Line Manip End
scenarios.then: duration, success/failure counts, and relevant metadata are recorded
